channel.title: Home on MERGe Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Home on MERGe Lab

item.title: News
item.description: 2024 Jan. 2024 – Annan and Lilly’s paper “Embedded air channels transform soft lattices into sensorized grippers” has been accepted to ICRA 2024! See y’all in Yokohama! Jan. 2024 – Valerie, Lilly, Jeana and Annan’s paper “Online Packing of Groceries Through Soft Fingers with Integrated Visual-Tactile Sensing” has been accepted to Robosoft 2024! See y’all in San Diego! 2023 Dec. 2023 – Greg’s paper on “In-Hand Manipulation With a Simple Belted Parallel-Jaw Gripper” has been published in IEEE RA-L!

item.title: Publications
item.description: In all papers below, * means equal contribution to the manuscript. Members of the lab have been underlined. Notable papers have been highlighted. For the most up-to-date list of publications, please check Professor Chin’s Google Scholar profile. Embedded Air Channels Transform Soft Lattices into Sensorized Grippers Annan Zhang*, Lillian Chin*, Daniel L. Tong, Daniela Rus ICRA 2024 Paper | Video Summary of the paper Online Packing of Groceries Through Soft Fingers with Integrated Visual-Tactile Sensing

item.title: Research
item.description: Active Projects Blind Grasping [USE IMAGE FROM ICRA 2024 PAPER] This has been a longstanding project goal for me to accomplish. The idea is that we have an object inside of a box. I’d like the robot without vision to fumble around inside the box, hitting the walls and eventually finding the object. Then figuring out how to grasp the object in order to take it out. We can make it harder by adding more objects into the box and asking for a specific object to get pulled out.
